title: Agentic Chatbot using LangGraph
features: Designed and implemented an end‑to‑end agentic AI chatbot using LangGraph and LangChain, integrating real‑time web scraping and a Streamlit UI, achieving 30% faster response times versus baseline models.
Architected a modular node‑based workflow in LangGraph that enabled dynamic prompt routing and state management, reducing code complexity by 40% and simplifying future feature extensions.
Developed comprehensive error handling and logging across the chatbot stack, boosting system reliability and enabling 25% faster issue resolution in production deployments.
